Articles.Content:
can someone make a 1.2.2 mod for autodocking?

NOT. MECHJEB. IT CRASHES.

1. Figure out why mechjeb is crashing on your install and fix it. 
  2. Use mechjeb.

A lot has changed since 2013 when this thread was active. Try Docking Alignment Indicator. It doesn’t auto dock, but it gives you actual read outs you can use to dock yourself. Once you get the hang of it it’s very satisfying to do it manually. I hated it at first. Now it’s my fav flight maneuver
Your request has been moved to its own thread.

Make sure you are using the right version for 1.2.2, sounds like you may be using a newer one.

Also, a log file can help
I've never had a problem with Mechjeb in my many years of using it. I would try to fix it like others have suggested. Or learn to dock manually.
